description: Added more charts and data in the Analytics section
Added a button to update charts in the Analytics section
Fixed the in-game bug with the console
Added an engine which stores user activity based on URL changes
Added first chart and labels to display user activity
Added Privacy Policy
Fixed the bug with wrong paths to client assets in the web render on macOS and Linux
Added the detail in the Discord Rich Presence of the domain from which a player connects to Kirka.io
Added userscripts manager
Updated styles in Menu Modal
Bug fixes
Optimizations
Fixed a bug when opening a modal in-game
Added fast URL option
More binaries for macOS an Linux (x64 and arm64)
Slightly reduced size of each binary
Replaced window.console redefine with window.appconsole
Added popup messages when interacting with menu modal
If the config.json file is corrupted, it will set to default without notification
Added K/D ratio near kills and deaths in-game
Added an option to toggle 'Join Game' button in user Discord profile
Fixed a bug when extra values were not hiding properly in the in-game console
Added OS, version, and architecture into the in-game console
The userscripts are loaded before DOM
GitHub will release bundles also for macOS and Linux without the FPS uncap feature
The client will show user activity in the Discord profile based on the game URL
Added Kirka proxy domain support
The banner of the Redline Client repository has been changed
Added an option to import and export client settings
Added logo to the main menu
Added 'Customizations' section in the menu modal with Custom Keybinding, Userscripts, Userstyles, and Resource Swapper
Added 'Userscripts' section which you can use for your loaded userscripts
Added 'Changelog' section
Added client, Node, Electron, and Chromium versions into in-game console
Added access to console.log, console.error etc.
Added links to Tricko in player modals
Added Discord Rich Presence
Added changelog in JSON format
Added Alt+F4 keybind to quit the client
Added 'Back to Kirka' button for auth pages
GitHub Actions compile the client for multiple Windows architectures
The client has launched with adblocker, userscripts, userstyles, and resource swapper
